revised_title: Rectification of Logarithmic Errors in the Measurements of Two Sections of the Meridional Arc of India: A Revised Synopsis
tldr: The author, Colonel Everest, addresses the rectification of logarithmic errors in the measurements of two sections of the Meridional Arc of India. He presents a revised synopsis of the measurements, which were conducted as part of the Great Trigonometrical Survey of India. The corrections were made possible through the collaboration with Colonel Waugh and his computing establishment.
